SENT.plain: Polymerase chain reaction (PCR) assays have been developed for follicular lymphoma-associated BCL-2/J(H) translocations
Few data are available on the quantitation by PCR of these translocations in peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBM) of follicular lymphoma (FL) patients
We report that only one of five studied FL patients had a high level of these translocations in the circulation, namely, about 35,000 translocations per 5 x 10(6) PBM
This patient was stable with an excellent performance status at the time of this assay; however, he died of leukemia 1 month later
